name: @redviking/sparkplug-payload
description: A library for encoding and decoding Sparkplug payloads

scripts.build:proto: yarn dlx -p protobufjs@^6.8.0 pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o lib/sparkplugPayloadProto.js ../../../sparkplug_b/sparkplug_b.proto && yarn dlx -p protobufjs@^6.8.0 pbts -o lib/sparkplugPayloadProto.d.ts lib/sparkplugPayloadProto.js

author: Chad Kienle <chad.kienle@cirrus-link.com> (http://www.cirrus-link.com)
